description: This cocktail bar on the seafront is also a restaurant specialising in fresh fish served in a selection of classic dishes (such as tartare) and more elaborate recipes. The dining room is modern and spacious, plus there’s an outdoor terrace for alfresco dining in fine weather. Guestrooms and luxury apartments are also available (swimming pool on the roof).
